content: hearts and bobbles table runner designed by knittykittylove materials g hook 145 yards worsted weight - i used loops & threads cotton colors in sunrise special note beginning ch2s do not count as a stitch bobble stitch 1 yarn over insert hook into stitch and pull up a loop yarn over pull through two 2 repeat number one in the same stitch/space until you have a total of 6 loops on your hook 3 yarn over pull through all 6 loops at once pattern r1 - ch6 turn 6 chs r2 - double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook double_crochet to end turn 4 double_crochet r3 - ch2 double_crochet in same st double_crochet to end turn 4 double_crochet r4 - ch2 double_crochet in same st double_crochet to end ch6 turn 4 double_crochet 6 chs r5 - slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch in next 4 chs slip_stitch in next 4 sts chain 7 turn 9 slsts 7 chs r6 - double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook double_crochet to end turn 14 double_crochet r7- ch2 double_crochet in same st double_crochet to end turn 14 double_crochet r8 - ch2 double_crochet in same st double_crochet to end chain 4 turn 14 double_crochet 4 chs r9 - slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch in next 2 chs slip_stitch in next 14 sts chain 5 turn 17 slsts 5 chs r10 - double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook double_crochet to end turn 20 double_crochet r11-14 - ch2 double_crochet in same st double_crochet to end turn 20 double_crochet r15 - ch2 double_crochet in same st double_crochet in each of next 8 sts ch2 and skip next 2 sts double_crochet in each of next 9 sts turn 18 double_crochet 2 chs r16 - ch2 double_crochet in same st double_crochet in each of next 7 sts ch2 and skip next st double_crochet in chain-2 space ch2 and skip next st double_crochet in each of next 8 sts turn 17 double_crochet 4 chs r17 - ch2 double_crochet in same st double_crochet in each of next 6 sts ch2 and skip next st double_crochet in chain-2 space ch2 and skip next st double_crochet in chain-2 space ch2 and skip next st double_crochet in each of next 7 sts turn 16 double_crochet 6 chs r18 - ch2 double_crochet in same st double_crochet in each of next 5 sts ch2 and skip next st double_crochet in chain-2 space ch2 and skip next st double_crochet in chain-2 space ch2 and skip next st double_crochet in chain-2 space ch2 and skip next st double_crochet in each of next 6 sts turn 15 double_crochet 8 chs r19 - ch2 double_crochet in same st double_crochet in each of next 5 sts ch4 and skip chain-2 space and double_crochet 1 double_crochet in next chain-2 space 1 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next chain-2 space ch4 and skip next st and chain-2 space double_crochet in each of next 6 sts turn 15 double_crochet 8 chs r20 - ch2 double_crochet in same st double_crochet in each
